nodes.bodyText: shall we introduce a method to create a registryEntry when parameters are given? also another method to return a registryEntry with some default values.
the reason is, if we are to add a new property to a schema there;s a lot of places to change to include them in the tests. By introducing a method we can minimize that effort.

Shall we declare variables for "Entry Name 2", "{mutualTLS: false}" and "https://xyz2.com"?
It has been used in many places.
